name: Moto X Rider Free
description:
Addictive Motocross Stunt Game! Control the bike as you complete levels while performing extreme tricks, 360, wheelies, front ends and more! Features true to life mechanics, animations and physics.

- Multiple animations
- Crash animations
- Stunts and motion controls
- Realistic physics
- Ramps, up, down and long jumps
- Endless levels
- Over 60 stunning scenes
- Full game

Comes with Standard and Advanced Stunt bike types to take your motocross fun to another level.

Endless levels speed up as you complete each stage. Compete for most level leader board achievements to become the Moto X Rider King!
